example.code:
PS C:\> Dismount-EC2Volume -VolumeId vol-12345678
AttachTime : 12/22/2015 1:53:58 AM DeleteOnTermination : False Device : /dev/sdh InstanceId : i-1a2b3c4d State : detaching VolumeId : vol-12345678
example.description: This example detaches the specified volume.
You can also specify the instance ID and device name to ensure that you are detaching the correct volume.
